description.en: On Chaitra Amavasya, who gives a pot filled with `pAnakam`, he has indeed performed a hundred `gayAzrAddham`! He also gets the benefit of performing `SaNNavatizrAddham`!

shlokas:
yO dadyAccaitradarzE tu kumbhaM pUrNaM tu pAnakaiH.
gayAzrAddhazataM tEna kRtamEva na saMzayaH..52..
kastUrI karpurOpEtaM mallikOzIrasaMyutam.
kalazaM pAnakaiH pUrNaM caitradarzE tu mAnavaH.
dadyAtpitRRnsamuddizya sa SaNNavatidO bhavEt..53..
-- skandapurANE dvitIyE vaiSNavakhaNDE vaizAkhamAhAtmyE tRtIyE adhyAyE
